review.comment: My money was stolen here I have my debit card and I’m in another city and someone’s been using my card numbers to get money from here I called about it and haven’t received a call back

review.review_reply: Really appreciate this excellent review, Mary Esther! Hope to see you whenever you're around. -The Big Clean Management
Happy you could swing by, Jamal! We look forward to seeing you here in the future. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Very nice and clean.
review.review_reply: So glad you enjoyed your visit, Vendirie! We aim to have a clean building and machines every time you stop in to do your laundry. Hope to have you back again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Dryers are wayyyyyy to expensive washers don't cycle out the water so you spend way more on dryers
review.review_reply: Abbas, thank you for sharing your feedback. Sometimes the size of the washer doesn't match the size of a laundry load, so if this is the case, you may need to use a larger machine that has more room to spin your items. If you think specific machines were underperforming, please give us a call at (512) 965-2065, so we can make sure they are working properly. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment:
Love this place. Very clean. Next to food and coffee. Staff is helpful.

UPDATE

I used to really love this place. It’s clean inside and the machines work well. You can pay with a card or Apple Pay. I have an autoimmune disease that can make it hard for me to do much of anything. A couple of years ago I started to use their fluff and fold service regularly. It was fairly priced and my laundry was done well. I stopped using their service a few months ago because my clothes come back with half of them inside out, some of it not fully dried, most of a full bottle of detergent is used. It’s a great place if you’re doing your laundry yourself.
review.review_reply: Really appreciate you joining us to wash a load! We look forward to having you here again soon. -The Big Clean Management
We appreciate you visiting us, Sharon! We hope to see you in the future. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Great spot
review.review_reply: We're glad you visited us, Terrence! We hope to have you back our way. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Machines work great, love that I can use my debit card (if needed) for each machine. The best part.. the place is super clean! Much appreciated!!! 💜
review.review_reply: Jessica, we are grateful for your support. You can always expect great working machines and a clean building when you stop here to do your laundry. Looking forward to welcoming you back the next time you stop in. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I never knew how disgusting laundromats can be. Thank you for keeping yours so clean!
review.review_reply: Steven, we're called The Big Clean Laundromat for a reason! Happy to hear you enjoyed our facilities. Feel free to come by anytime you need! -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: What can you say you go there to wash clothes I mean I got somebody they got an attended on from 8:00 in the morning till like I don't know 5:00 at night something like that there is a public restroom and I guess they're wheelchair Park and you only park in the back and it's only the only entrance is in the back there's nothing off Parmer Ln. Go behind the Taco Bell and it's the next building over on the other side of Taco Bell that's how you get there everything works in there it's clean too
review.review_reply: James, we appreciate your excellent recommendation. Our clean and spacious facility, helpful attendants, and clean restrooms make us a great place to get laundry done. See you around. -The Big Clean Management
Thank you for this great review, Mary! We'd love to see you back again soon. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I came in to wash clothes as I do a couple times a week and it was around 9:30 at night and upon getting my clothes in the washer I had some trash to throw away so the trash can was turned upside down and I flipped it back over and here comes the employee yelling at me that the trash can was turned upside down for a reason and that everyone needs to leave their trash in the rolling baskets that the laundrymat provides.and he yelled it to everyone.how rude and disrespectful and very unbusiness like.I have never been more embarrassed than I was tonight over throwing a piece of trash away in the correct place.trust and believe it won’t happen again cuz I’ll never frequent this establishment again
review.review_reply: We appreciate your consideration in wanting to throw out your trash. While we have certain procedures in place as to which bins or baskets are used for which purpose, we understand if customers are not familiar with our methods. Our team members are known for being friendly and welcoming to everyone who walks through our doors, so we apologize that you didn't receive that great service from us. We hope you'll consider doing your laundry with us again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Always clean and the machines are maintained well. Big shout out to Chris for keeping it that way! 💯
review.review_reply: David, thank you for giving a shout-out to Chris! You said it best: We are always clean and have well-maintained machines. We'll be here the next time you need to do laundry. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Large, clean, well working machines. Facility is clean and spacious. Staff is quite friendly.
review.review_reply: David, thank you for taking a moment to leave a review. You can count on us to have large, clean, working machines. We'll be here if you need us again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Friendly, clean, a good place to do laundry.
review.review_reply: Daniel, thank you for stopping by! We appreciate being called a good place to do laundry. We hope to see you whenever you're around. -The Big Clean Management
Really appreciate the excellent review, Anthony! We hope you'll come back again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I love coming here there's different sizes of washers and dryers. Staff is always so helpful.
review.review_reply: Lily, thanks for sharing the love! Anytime you need another hand with your laundry, you know where to find us! -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: This laundromat was super clean and the bathroom was just as clean, which is a plus for me. I was greeted with a friendly smile from Kris and Donald. Thank you so much for the great experience!! I'll definitely recommend this laundromat. 😁👍
review.review_reply: Melissa, we know how important cleanliness is for a local laundromat, so you can always expect it to be spotless in here! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon. We'll be here whenever you need us! -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: The staff is extremely rude. No help, last time I was here the bathroom had a key and when I went to ask the question before I could even ask the lady sighed rolled here eyes and apparently they don't do that anymore? I have been waiting to use the rest room knocked multiple times and no one is in there??? I was told I couldn't hold a basket but it seems like everyone around me is? Possibly because I'm white?it's absurd. There is definitely a key for the rest room and why she is not giving it to me I do not know? Get someone else to work your desk..
review.review_reply: Shauna, we're really disappointed that we may have done anything to make you feel unwelcomed here. We will be looking into this to see how we can improve our customer service experience. We hope we earn your trust back in the future with the friendly, helpful service we always strive for. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Always clean, multiple options for payment
review.review_reply: Rachel, thanks for this excellent review! We hope to have you back our way again soon. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: It's Big, it's Clean & it's not in the hood. It's pretty much always busy but not really packed. If a dryer doesn't dry your clothes as expected just let the ladies at the counter know and they'll test them and get you a good dryer going for a cycle or two. They offer wash/dry/fold services and have a little vending machine for laundry supplies which is really convenient, a coin machine, expected and offer reloadable wash cards to load credits via debit/credit card or cash and I think every 10th wash and dry is free if you use the wash card or same debit/credit card each time.
review.review_reply: We do our best to make laundry day as convenient as possible, so it's great to hear you enjoy coming to us! Thanks for all the helpful feedback. We look forward to seeing you in again soon. -The Big Clean Management
We're glad you enjoyed coming to us, Shawn! We hope we'll see you next time. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I dont like this place i had some shoes stolen off of my car at this place and NOTHING was done about it
review.review_reply:
LB- we assisted the best we could. Unfortunately, Austin PD was behind on cases and by the time the subpoena was issued for video footage, the footage was no longer available. Our security company does require that we have an issued subpoena before releasing footage to us for the protection of all parties involved.

Also, we might add, these were shoes that were left unattended on the hood or trunk of your vehicle near the entrance of the neighboring apartment complex. This was not while inside of our establishment.
We appreciate this excellent review, Yoenki! Hope you'll make it back our way again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment:
(Translated by Google) Very professional and clean machine all the time / They are very professional always clean machines All the time

(Original)
Very professional and clean machine all the time / son muy profesionales siempre maquinas limpias Todo El tiempo
review.review_reply: Eduardo, so happy to hear you enjoy coming to our laundromat! You're welcome in anytime you need. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Generally a nice laundromat. Just kinda pricey.
review.review_reply: We're so glad you enjoy coming to our laundromat! Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback. We hope to have you back soon. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Nice and clean
review.review_reply: Bobby, we're really glad you had a good visit! We hope you'll make it back again soon. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Lives up to its name! The HUGE bonus is its location to literally THEE best and most pristine Taco Bell right next door!!! Dryers worked exceedingly well. Absolutely no sour smell inside. Brightly lit. Great attendant! Snack and soda vending machine inside. There are restrooms but they do close at a certain time, so just be aware. They also offer free WiFi and some places have tables and chairs to sit at too! Great business blueprint, truly built with the customer in mind = D
review.review_reply: Whether you're grabbing a snack from our vending machine or from the Taco Bell next door, you can always trust that your laundry is getting an excellent clean here! So glad you enjoy coming to our laundromat so much. Thanks for all your wonderful support. -The Big Clean Management
Happy you enjoyed coming to us, Cindy! Looking forward to having you here again. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I went there to wash clothes ended up having to leave bc I needed help with purchasing a laundry card with my debit card. There was no attendants available I even called the store while I was inside to see if anyone would actually answer or was there. But the place was filled with people. Definitely not a great experience
review.review_reply: We do our best to make laundry day easier on our customers, so we're sorry there were no attendants available to help you. Thanks for bringing this feedback to our attention. We hope you'll have a better experience with us in the future. -The Big Clean Management

Burt, we apologize if you weren't completely happy with your visit. We do our best to make laundry day a breeze for our customers. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to make your next experience more enjoyable. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Its a  lil cool lil o stud werkin in yonda..she a stiff one too..so dont go n der ackin like its yo house..cuz when its time to mop & clean house. .u better be getting yo rags together cuz she holding da fort down.. its clean nd nice nd smellin good too..u mite run into a couple of freaky eses on yo way out in da parking lot but nothing too wild..I like dis place ..nd when its hot, sometimes I just go pull up n their parkin lot under a tree nd take a breather ........ .thanks
review.review_reply: We couldn't have said it better ourselves! Glad to know you like coming to our place. You're welcome here anytime -- hot or cold. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: If you have a service animal do not go to this place I was confronted by the owner at the front door that I am not allowed to have my service animal on the premises. She then asked me why I had a service animal and I told her it was a HIPAA violation for her to ask me but it was for my balance and she cut me off before I could say a word. She then proceeded to tell me that she was a business owner from California  for 10 years And that she knows her rights. I told her I didn’t want any confrontation with her as she was yelling at me. I asked her to settle down several times and she looked at me as if she wanted to kill me I think once she told me she was coming from California that was enough for me so I went down the street and found a better laundry mat
review.review_reply: Tessa- we are so sorry for your experience. You must have the wrong location, none of our managers or owners are in fact a female from California. There are several laundromats within the area, one by a similar name, maybe you possibly have them mixed up? We do absolutely allow service animals at our locations as required by Federal Law. We do invite you to visit our actual business with a service animal any time.
We're so happy you enjoyed coming to us, Katie! Feel free to come back anytime you need. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Very clean, very affordable snacks, maybe a tad pricey but for the safety I felt with the cameras, spread out seating, and overall pleasant atmosphere. It's a pretty good place to laundry
review.review_reply: Tori, we do our best to make sure our customers feel safe and well taken care of here. It's great to hear you enjoyed coming to us to get your laundry done. Feel free to join us again anytime you need! -The Big Clean Management
We're really glad you enjoyed coming to us, Gabriella! We can't wait to see you in again next time. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: I like the jumbo dry it can literally fit like 7 loads
review.review_reply: Brianna, it's so convenient not having to do one load at a time! You'll always be welcome to come in to use our jumbo machines. See you again next time. -The Big Clean Management
Brandon, thanks for this review! Looking forward to having you back again soon. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: A great place to wash your clothes. It was nice and clean.
review.review_reply: Dina, happy you could get your laundry done in our clean facilities! We'd be happy to welcome you back anytime you need. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment:
This is the best laundromat from here to Maine!
Honestly we've been to a lot of laundromat, this 1 is the best.
review.review_reply: Patricia, so happy you're such a fan of our laundromat! Can't wait to help you out again in the future. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Very clean, attendant was friendly and helpful. Quiet and I felt comfortable and safe.
review.review_reply: Gayle, helping our customers to feel comfortable in our laundromat is always the goal, so it's great to hear you had a wonderful experience here. Feel free to come back anytime you need. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: First impression is everything. Clean place, cool staff, variety of equipment, quiet... A place for my son to play! Nothing bad I can say !!
review.review_reply: Wow Lilia!! You’re an outstanding person! We absolutely cannot thank you enough for the wonderful review! We are glad you found us.. thank you for your business! We look forward to wowing you again and again..

review.comment: Use to be very clean...now there is roaches everywhere...never going back...I hate that because I loved the location
review.review_reply: Tammie, you must have the wrong business? We have bi-monthly pest control. Unless they came from someone’s clothing or items they brought in on whatever particular day, we would absolutely not have roaches or pests in general. Hope you stop by a Big Clean Laundromat location soon.

review.comment: One of the cleanest laundromat I've been to, the staff are constantly making rounds, cleanning the vendía machines, washers, dryers.
review.review_reply: Ernesto, cleanliness is one of our top priorities! We're so glad you've been pleased with your experiences here. Come by anytime you need! -The Big Clean Management
We're really happy you had a good visit! Looking forward to seeing you here in the future. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment: Clean, affordable, friendly staff, and hands down one of the best laundromats I’ve ever been too.
review.review_reply: Sonya, it means a lot to know you think of us as one of the best laundromats you've ever been to! Our team is always happy to welcome you in on laundry day. Thanks so much for all your support. -The Big Clean Management

review.comment:
Needed to wash some duvets and heavy curtains which could not be done in my washing machine at home because of their sizes.  Decided to venture out and was pleasantly surprised by the neatness of the place and the quality of the machines.  The lady attendant was very helpful as I haven't been to a coin operated machine in decades.  The machines operated flawlessly and quickly.  It only took about 30 minutes per machine to wash the duvets.  Drying was about 20 minutes.  Would have taken much much longer even if I could do them at home.  The ability to use a credit or debit card to operate the machines made the experience even better.

Would have been a 5-star but the men's toilet was not working when I visited.

Overall very satisfied.
review.review_reply: It can be tough to wash large curtains and duvets, but there's nothing our machines can't handle! We're so glad you found us in your search, and thanks for all your feedback. Feel free to come by anytime you need us in the future! -The Big Clean Management
